title: Couple With Heart: Woman, Man, Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a ropersontic couple, specifically a person and a person, who share a loving bond. It signifies deep affection, partnership, and ropersontic love between two individuals.
apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji, as seen on Apple devices, illustrates two individuals embracing within a radiant heart, with one person exhibiting no skin tone and the other a light skin tone. Apple's meticulous 3D design imbues the figures with a gentle dimensionality, while the heart glows with a soft, inviting luminescence, amplified by smooth gradients. The overall presentation, with its rounded edges and subtle shading, evokes a profound sense of unity and shared affection, making it a beautiful way to express partnership, friendship, or romantic devotion.
